playscript.title: This is no big time contest

knot.line: Hey, look what I brought ya!
Oh thanks baby, just... put it down here...
This drill hasn't worked since... Since I bought it.
I thought you was out here composing.
Oh I tried a few things but, uh... I dunno I guess I just wasn't inspired.
Well I'm here now.
And yet somehow I'm still not inspired?
Well if you're not gonna write no songs why don't you dig out some of these to send in?
I already looked, believe me there's nothing in there worth sending.
Oh don't give me that there's bound to be an undiscovered masterpiece in here.
Trust me, they all suck mud. Face it I'm a small time contractor, I ain't no big time composer.
Well this is no big time contest! What is this?
What?
<sings> "Ooh baby baby give it to me / give it to me Hey baby baby give it to me / give it to me"
Give it to me.
It was a... It was a dance hit.
Oh in the 70s I guess...
Yeah it's just, lyrics weren't important.
I was really moved by it, I was getting ready to give it to ya.
Oh! Ha! You wanna hear something really bad?
Is it worse than that one?
Much worse. Almost criminal.
Ooh baby baby give it to me.
I wrote this when I was 19. Let's see...
"Blueberry fantasy / tangerine dream" <sings> "Love is a rainbow / of incense and cream"
Oh now I know why you can't remember your teen years.
It marked the end of my psychedelic period.
No that's the one, you wanna send that in!
Ah, let's just forget about the contest and clean up this mess.
All right you're the boss.
I'm sorry for a minute there I thought I heard you say I was the boss.
<laughs>
What's that?
Oh that's nothing it's just... something I was workin' on.
Hey let me hear it!
Well it doesn't really have a tune yet.
So I wanna hear it anyway.
Well I'm kinda rusty. Let's see.
<hesitantly sings> "There's a river..."
<sings> "There's a river high in the mountains that's been flowing since who knows when"
I like it!
You don't recognise it, do you?
Uh-uh.
No? <sings> "No one's sure just how it started but it's never gonnna end"
It's one of you poems.
Gosh that is. I can't believe you saved it.
Yeah I've saved everything you've ever written.
Except for a few notes on the refrigerator door.
That's so *sweet*.
You like it?
Yeah!
Well it's half yours. Maybe if I goose it up a little bit.
<sings better> "There's a river high in the mountains that's been flowing since who knows when no one's sure just how it started but it's never gonnna end"
<sings louder> "Our love is like that river flowing through all time heaven knows I need you and I'll never change my mind"
<still singing> "Heaven knows how I love you and I'll never change my mind"
Yeah? You like it?
It's beautiful!
Yeah? You think it's good enough to enter?
I think it's good enough to win?
Yeah?
Yeah I really do.
Really?
I really really do!
Hey and you know then when we go out on tour the kids ain't coming with us, right?
Right!
Bugger this.
